Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulin (light chain specific) immunological test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Optilite Freelite Kappa and Lambda Free Kits for quantitative in vitro measurement of serum free light chains to aid in diagnosis and monitoring of plasma cell disorders including multiple myeloma and MGUS
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative in vitro measurement of kappa or lambda free light chains in serum using the Binding Site Optilite analyser; aids in diagnosis and monitoring of multiple myeloma, lymphocytic neoplasms, Waldenström’s macroglobulinaemia, AL amyloidosis, light chain deposition disease, connective tissue diseases (e.g., SLE), and evaluation of monoclonal gammopathy of undetermined significance (MGUS) in conjunction with other laboratory and clinical findings.
